Bulmacaların giderek geliştiğini ve Portal gibi mükemmel bir oyunun temellerinin burada atılmaya başlandığını görmek çok mutluluk verici. Ne yazık ki bu oyunda zombi öldürmemiz gereken kısımlar biraz uzun ve sıkıcı olmuş. Alyx'in yanımızda olması bunu bir nebze örtüyor, çoğu aksiyonu ona bırakabiliyoruz. Geri kalan bölümleri, özellikle ilk bölümü çok güzel. Klasik bir Half Life oyunu.
Efsane serinin devamı. Tek sıkıntısı yer altından çıktıktan sonra biraz fazla tekrara düşmesi. Ama kesinlikle oynanmalı.

Great.
- The limited flashlight and sprint is annoying.
- I wish we had some Xen.
Гордон Фриман отменяет стазис и покидает любимый город

Half-Life 2 Episode 1 is the second expansion to the video game after Half-Life 2. This game added new features like Antlion burrows, Zombines, and Alyx having a shotgun. I really did enjoy this game, but it was very, very hard.

I had to skip Direct Intervention because of how misleading the level layout was, and i had to constantly check a guide for help. I still believe its a good video game for the better music, outside game design and good introductions to levels, this game isn't perfect though.

And i had to decide if i liked i or not, because its such a mixed opinion across people around the world. But when you are looking away from really hard combat and puzzles, this game has a rich story and good introduction to many things, even know it changes rapidly from the Citadel rubble (or something) to the Citadel Core to some underground place and back into City 17 and then a hospital and blah blah blah, this game was definelity fun. Sure, hard games are usually said as bad, i think of it differently. This game made me feel like i accomplished something just like Half-Life 1 and Half-Life 2. 

The atmosphere of the game is peak production in just a span of a couple months or something, they made some really fun engagements that although are very simple, they are very complex as well. It certainly shows how bad the combine really is with the stalkers screaming in pain in either Lowlife or Direct Intervention, or to the Antlion guard being trapped by the combine and showing that the combine really combines others forces for their own power. Along with music.

And about the music, of course its good. Its made by Kelly Bailey, go watch a retrospective of the music of Half-Life and how good it is. 

But yeah, if you wanna have a challenge, play this game. Its another great game made by VALVe.

A great mini-sequel, it took me about 3.5 hours to complete. I felt the story on this one was a little lacklustre compared to the other Half-Life games and the game can get a bit annoying with the amount of zombies and dark places it throws you in but the end leaves you feeling satisfied and rewarded.

Half-Life 2: Episode One is certainly a game you shouldn't miss if you're a fan of the Half-Life series. Although it is more or less mediocre as compared to its predecessor, it continues the story and adds some new mechanics/enemies to spice things up.

The Half-Life franchise is an amazing franchise that you should really support. Most of the games are awesome and this one is one of them. It has a bit of tense moments and some what difficult puzzles. Really is a must play game.

İlk bölümden çok daha iyi ve şu asansör görevi cuk diye oturmuş. Bazı yerler sağlam sıksa da bölüm hızla bittiği için çok farketmiyor. Onun haricinde mayın olayı çok abartılmış. En azından araç kullanma görevleri yokta tak diye bitti.
A good sequel to the game, but very short

This game saved my life.

I am 41.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.
After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

This is an amazing game. :)

Хорошее и короткое продолжение Half-Life 2. Если вам понравилась 2 часть похождений Гордона и интересно, то можно купить для продолжения истории в вашем особняке с историями, но оно короткое, что может печалить за 200 руб, а за эту цену можно купить Garry's Mod и проиграть больше и интереснее. Но если вам без разницы, покупайте для пополнения библиотеки.
